text: Field Marshal Peter Anthony Inge, Baron Inge, (5 August 1935 â€“ 20 July 2022) was a senior British Army officer. He was the Chief of the General Staff, the professional head of the British Army, from 1992 to 1994. He then was Chief of the Defence Staff before retiring in 1997. Inge died on 20 July 2022, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:British military people Category:People from Surrey Category:United Kingdom Life Peers
title: Peter Inge, Baron Inge
